name: One Frog, few Flies and a lot of Water Lilies
name_original: One Frog, few Flies and a lot of Water Lilies
description:
You are a lovely frog that lives quietly in your pond. Suddenly you get hungry and you decide to hunt a few flies.

Catch the FLIES without falling into the water and then jump to WATER LILY.

Do not think you're going to have it easy.
